FileFormat.FormatDescription: Lgs files contain all project information for Leica Geosystems HDS software. They enable storage and transfer between all Leica Geosystemsâ€™ HDS software products. Lgs files store information including: Name, Thumbnail, Coordinate system, Publish date, SiteMap image(s), Hyperlinks between SiteMaps, Timestamp, RGB colours and HDR colours. Files can be password protected.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF Absolute from beginning of file, magic bytes: "wild::geosystems" EOF, offset 0-64, magic bytes: "Leica Project File"
